repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p: Complete text of the Nālaṭiyār with a substantial commentary.
The commentary corresponds for the Atikāra Aṭaivu to the Viḷakka Urai, for the Kaṭavuḷ Vāḻttu and the 400 stanzas to Tarumar's commentary in the Caracuvatimakāl 1980 edition.
With satellite material and a colophon (without date, but with a scribal caveat).
Description by Eva Wilden based on the digital images available on Gallica.
Original manuscript examined by Emmanuel Francis (November 2022).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

collation.desc: 3 folios = guard leaves. No foliation. Blank recto verso, except for a piḷḷaiyār cūḻi in the left margin of f[2]r.
5 folios = Nālaṭiyār: Commentary (Atikāra Aṭaivu Urai). Tamil foliation 1-5.
164 folios = Nālaṭiyār: Text & Commentary. Tamil foliation 6-169.
2 folios = guard leaves. No foliation. Blank recto verso.

handNote.desc: Traditional script with modern ṟa. Ducler's scribe.

additions.desc:
Left-marginal intertitles:

f68r: tīviṉaiyaccam

f82v: periyāraippiḻaiyāmai

f96v: cuṟṟantaḻal

f135r: Avaiyaṟital

Foliation “169” added in black in the left margin of f169r.

binding.p: Original ebony covers. Tamil letter Ī engraved (front cover, verso and back cover, recto).

origin.origDate: No internal date. Dated to circa 1830 by Vinson (1868) and to 1830 by Cabaton (1912), on unstated grounds (presumably palaeographical and material analysis arguments). Not after 1852, since part of the collection of Eugène Burnouf (1812-1852). Appears to be by the hand of Ducler's scribe, working around 1830.

acquisition.p: Acquired, August 2nd, 1854, from “Madame veuve Burnouf”. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 2 = Acquisitions: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1893, no. 4955.

listBibl.bibl: Nālaṭiyār. 1921. Camaṇamuṉivarkaḷ iyaṟṟiya Nālaṭiyār mūlamum teḷiporuḷ viḷakkamum. uraiyāciriyar Vai. Mu. Caṭakōparāmānujācāriyar/Cē. Kiruṣṇamācariyar. iraṇṭām patippu. Ceṉṉai: Śrī Kaṇēc Accukkūṭṭam.
Nālaṭiyār. 1964. Patiṉeṇkīḻkkaṇakku Nālaṭiyār urai. uraiyāciriyar Ti. Cu. Pālacuntaram Piḷḷai. Reprint. Ceṉṉai: Kaḻakam. [1st ed. 1945, rep. 1949, 1953, 1957, 1961]

Nālaṭiyār. 1980. Nālaṭiyār uraivaḷam (mūlamum mūṉṟu paḻaiya uraikaḷum aṭaṅkiyatu). 2 vols. patippāciriyarkaḷ S. Mutturatṉa Mutaliyār/M.R. Kantacāmi Piḷḷai. 2nd edition. Tañcāvūr: Makārājā Cāpōjiyiṉ Caracuvati Makāl Nūl Nilayam. [1st ed. 1953]
Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 13, no. 61.
S.n. 1854. Catalogue des livres imprimés et manuscrits composant la bibliothèque de feu M. Eugène Burnouf. Paris: Duprat. — See p. 347, no. 176.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamouls et télingas. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 20r, no. 61.

Vinson, Julien. 1868. Manuscrits tamouls. Proofreadings of the catalogue for Tamoul 1-204 (old shelfmark). Printed by the atelier oriental de l’Imprimerie nationale. BnF “4-IMPROR-77 (B)” — See p. 20, n0. 61. — The same proofreadings with black ink handwritten corrections are found in Vinson et al. (1866-, f1-f49).

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

revisionDesc.change: Updated to TST encoding conventions by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 1, May 2022.
Revised by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 2, July 2022.
Revised and enlarged by Emmanuel FRANCIS after examination of the original manuscript. Version 3, November 2022.

seg.note: found as beginning of Tarumar’s commentary in the Caracuvati Makāl 1980 edition, p. 1.

ab.seg:
celvanilaiyāmai Iḷamainilaiyāmai yākkanilaiyāmai yeṉṟu matikāravaṭaivukaḷukku ma
laivām ~ Aḵtāvatu ~ yātō veṉṉil muṉpu yākkaiyuḷatā yatil nilaiyāmai yuṇarttiyatu nilainiṉṟa piṉpu Iḷamainilaiyā
maiyai yuṇarttiya piṉpu vanta Iḷamaip paruvattilē ~ muyaṉṟu ~ Uṇṭāṉa celvattiṉilaiyāmai yuṇarttavēṇṭāvō veṉil
yākkai vayatu nūṟeṉaṟu miḷaimai vayatu muppattireṇṭeṉṟu moru niyamaṅka ḷuṇṭu

seg.seg:
Itaṉ mēlappāṭṭiṉuṭaiya payaṉkaḷai
k kūṟuppaṭṭatu not identical with the Caracuvati Makāl 1980 edition

lg.l: taṇṭār poṟaittan tāṉ found as second verse in Tarumar’s commentary in the Caracuvati Makāl 1980 edition, p. 1., where this identifies the commentator with a reading tarumaṉ instead of tantāṉ.

ab.seg:
Etu vāṉiṭu villiṉ varavaṟi
yā vāymaiyāl ~ vāṉiṉkaṇṇē tōṉṟiya villiṉatu tōṟṟamu miḻappu maṟiya variyatu ~ Atu pōṉṟa piṟappiṉa tiyalpaiyu maṟivaritu ~ yitu uṇmaiyātalā
l kāṉilan tōyāk kaṭavuḷai nilattiṉkaṇṇē kāl tariyātatōr kaṭavuḷai yāṉilañ ceṉṉiyuṟa vaṇaṅki ~ yām nilattiṉkaṇṇē ceṉṉimutalā
kiya vēṭṭuṟuppukaḷum muntum paṭikku orumaiyuṭaṉ vaṇakkañ ceytu ~

kaṇmūṉ ṟu
ṭaiyāṉuṅ kākkaiyum paiyaravu
meṉṉīṉṟa yāyum piḻaittateṉ ~ poṉṉīṉṟa
koṅkarum peṉṉa mulaiyāy poruḷvayiṟ
pāṅkaṉār ceṉṟa ṉeṟi ~

Etu ~ kaṇmūṉṟu
ṭaiyāṉum ~ mūṉṟukaṇṇuṭaiya civaṉum ~ kākamum paiyaravum ~ paṭattaiyuṭaiya pāmpum Eṉṉaip peṟṟa tāyum piḻaittateṉ yāṉ varuntac ceyta kuṟṟamillai poṉṉīṉ
ṟa kōṅkarumpaṉṉa mulaiyāy ~ kōṅkarumpiṉai yottup poṉcitarntaḻaku peṟṟa mulaiyiṉaiyuṭaiyāy poruḷvayiṟ pāṅkaṉār ceṉṟa neṟi poruḷ vayiṟ papirinta talai
var ceṉṟa vaḻiyē nammai varuttañ ceytateṉṟavāṟu ~ kaṇmūṉṟuṭaiyāṉ piḻaittalāvatu kāmaṉai yiruvaḻittavaṉa ~ piṉpu mavaṉai yuḷakkiṉāṉeṉpatām ~ kākkai pi
ḻaittal varuttañ ceyvataṟakuk kāraṇamākak kuyil muṭṭaiyiṭa Ataṉait tāṉavaḷattuk kūvivittataṉāl varuttivittatām ~ paiyaravu piḻaittal ~ tāṉ viḻuṅkiya matiyaic
cerippittuviṭāma lataṉai mīḷavuṅ kāṉ ṟataṉāl varuttivittatām ~ tāy piḻaittatu ~ taṉṉaip peṟṟu yippaṭi varuntumpaṭi vaittāḷeṉpatām ~ Ivaṟṟāl varitta
ñ ceyta tillai yeṉavē Ivvakaittāl varuntiya vataṉaiyuṭkoṇṭu talaivar ceṉṟa vaḻiyeṉ ṟataṉ mēlēṟṟit talaivaraic celuttutalākiyavaḻi yillai
yāyi ṉivaikaḷāṟ ceyyum varuttamu millaiyē namatu talaivarāl vanta varuttamaṉṟi Ivvakaittālāya varuttamallaveṉṟu kūṟātupōṟ kūṟiyatām ~ Itu piri
vāṟṟāt talaimakaḷ tōḻik kuraittatu 10

seg.note: same verse at the end of the Tarumar's commentary in Nālaṭiyār (1980).
